mn30:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn30:2.1: Atha kho pingalakoccho brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn30:2.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho pingalakoccho brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn30:2.3: “yeme, bho gotama, samanabrahmana sanghino ganino ganacariya nata yasassino titthakara sadhusammata, bahujanassa,
mn30:2.4: seyyathidam—purano kassapo, makkhali gosalo, ajito kesakambalo, pakudho kaccayano, sancayo belatthaputto, nigantho nataputto,
mn30:2.5: sabbete sakaya patinnaya abbhannamsu sabbeva nabbhannamsu, udahu ekacce abbhannamsu ekacce nabbhannamsu”ti?
mn30:2.7: sabbete sakaya patinnaya abbhannamsu sabbeva nabbhannamsu, udahu ekacce abbhannamsu ekacce nabbhannamsuti.
mn30:2.9: tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi, bhasissami”ti.
mn30:2.10: “Evam, bho”ti kho pingalakoccho brahmano bhagavato paccassosi.
mn30:3.1: “Seyyathapi, brahmana, puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva saram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma papatikam, sakhapalasam chetva adaya pakkameyya ‘saran’ti mannamano.
mn30:3.2: Tamenam cakkhuma puriso disva evam vadeyya:
mn30:3.3: ‘na vatayam bhavam puriso annasi saram, na annasi pheggum, na annasi tacam, na annasi papatikam, na annasi sakhapalasam.
mn30:3.4: Tatha hayam bhavam puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva saram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma papatikam, sakhapalasam chetva adaya pakkanto “saran”ti mannamano.
mn30:3.5: Yancassa sarena sarakaraniyam tancassa attham nanubhavissati’ti.

mn30:8.1: Evameva kho, brahmana, idhekacco puggalo saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito hoti:
mn30:8.2: ‘otinnomhi jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, dukkhotinno dukkhapareto,
mn30:8.3: appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
mn30:8.4: So evam pabbajito samano labhasakkarasilokam abhinibbatteti.
mn30:8.5: So tena labhasakkarasilokena attamano hoti paripunnasankappo.
mn30:8.6: So tena labhasakkarasilokena attanukkamseti, param vambheti:
mn30:8.7: ‘ahamasmi labhasakkarasilokava, ime pananne bhikkhu appannata appesakkha’ti.
mn30:8.8: Labhasakkarasilokena ca ye anne dhamma uttaritara ca panitatara ca tesam dhammanam sacchikiriyaya na chandam janeti, na vayamati, olinavuttiko ca hoti sathaliko.
mn30:8.9: Seyyathapi so, brahmana, puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato atikkammeva saram atikkamma pheggum atikkamma tacam atikkamma papatikam, sakhapalasam chetva adaya pakkanto ‘saran’ti mannamano.
mn30:8.10: Yancassa sarena sarakaraniyam tancassa attham nanubhavissati.

mn30:12.20: Katame ca, brahmana, dhamma nanadassanena uttaritara ca panitatara ca?
mn30:13.1: Idha, brahmana, bhikkhu vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:13.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:14.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu vitakkavicaranam vupasama ajjhattam sampasadanam cetaso ekodibhavam avitakkam avicaram samadhijam pitisukham dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:14.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:15.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu pitiya ca viraga upekkhako ca viharati, sato ca sampajano sukhanca kayena patisamvedeti, yam tam ariya acikkhanti: ‘upekkhako satima sukhavihari’ti tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:15.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:16.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahana dukkhassa ca pahana pubbeva somanassadomanassanam atthangama adukkhamasukham upekkhasatiparisuddhim catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:16.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:17.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara ‘ananto akaso’ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:17.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:18.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘anantam vinnanan’ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:18.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:19.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma ‘natthi kinci’ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:19.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:20.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati.
mn30:20.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:21.1: Puna caparam, brahmana, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati, pannaya cassa disva asava parikkhina honti.
mn30:21.2: Ayampi kho, brahmana, dhammo nanadassanena uttaritaro ca panitataro ca.
mn30:21.3: Ime kho, brahmana, dhamma nanadassanena uttaritara ca panitatara ca.
mn30:22.1: Seyyathapi so, brahmana, puriso saratthiko saragavesi sarapariyesanam caramano mahato rukkhassa titthato saravato saramyeva chetva adaya pakkanto ‘saran’ti janamano.
mn30:22.2: Yancassa sarena sarakaraniyam tancassa attham anubhavissati.
mn30:23.1: Iti kho, brahmana, nayidam brahmacariyam labhasakkarasilokanisamsam, na silasampadanisamsam, na samadhisampadanisamsam, na nanadassananisamsam.
mn30:23.2: Ya ca kho ayam, brahmana, akuppa cetovimutti—
mn30:23.3: etadatthamidam, brahmana, brahmacariyam, etam saram etam pariyosanan”ti.
mn30:24.1: Evam vutte, pingalakoccho brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn30:24.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
